channel.title: [Rune Evolution]
channel.description:
[center][size=16pt]Rune Evolution[/size][/center]
Hello, and welcome to the official development blog of the new server Rune Evolution. It's a F2P 317 server based off the Devolution 2.7 source released by killamess. It will feature all F2P features towards the end and when we open it up officially we may work on a members version. Currently all members items are blocked out and unobtainable.
[center][b][i][u]Coders[/u][/i][/b][/center] [center]1. Josh (Skype™)[/center]
Now onto the skills. [u][b] Attack, Strength, Defence, Range, and Magic[/b][/u] - 99.9% - Needs some last minute tuning but altogother it's around 99%. There is the beginning GFX, Air GFX, and End GFX for Magic. Range the arrow drops randomly and you hit better determining your bonuses etc. Melee works perfect with better hits if you have good armor.
[b][u]Prayer[/u][/b] - 95% All F2P prayers work the only thing missing is working headicons which are hard to get to work with a default 317 deob.
[b][u]Cooking[/u][/b] - All food has a burn-cook ratio with the higher the cooking level the less chance. All fish are cookable aswell as all meat.
[u][b]Fishing[/b][/u] - 100% both options work delete the right item and get the right fish depending on the level.
[u][b]Firemaking[/b][/u] - 100% You light back up and light another you CAN cook on them.
[u][b]Crafting[/b][/u] - 80% You craft gems at the moment will add more soon.
[u][b]Smithing[/b][/u] - 100% Interface changes for each type of bar, correct bar amount required and correct levels.
[u][b]Mining[/b][/u] - 95% Only missing the correct mining emote.
Images:
[img]http://71.61.61.170/1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/2.jpg[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/3.jpg[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/4.jpg[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/5.jpg[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/6.jpg[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/7.jpg[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/8.jpg[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/9.jpg[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/10.jpg[/img]
Will be getting more pictures soon!

item.title: [Rune Evolution]
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

[center][size=16pt]Rune Evolution[/size][/center]

Hello, and welcome to the official development blog of the new server Rune Evolution. It’s a F2P 317 server based off the Devolution 2.7 source released by killamess. It will feature all F2P features towards the end and when we open it up officially we may work on a members version. Currently all members items are blocked out and unobtainable.

[center]Coders[/center]
[center]1. Josh (Skype™)[/center]

Now onto the skills.

Attack, Strength, Defence, Range, and Magic - 99.9% - Needs some last minute tuning but altogother it’s around 99%. There is the beginning GFX, Air GFX, and End GFX for Magic. Range the arrow drops randomly and you hit better determining your bonuses etc. Melee works perfect with better hits if you have good armor.

Prayer - 95% All F2P prayers work the only thing missing is working headicons which are hard to get to work with a default 317 deob.

Cooking - All food has a burn-cook ratio with the higher the cooking level the less chance. All fish are cookable aswell as all meat.

Fishing - 100% both options work delete the right item and get the right fish depending on the level.

Firemaking - 100% You light back up and light another you CAN cook on them.

Crafting - 80% You craft gems at the moment will add more soon.

Smithing - 100% Interface changes for each type of bar, correct bar amount required and correct levels.

Mining - 95% Only missing the correct mining emote.

Images:

Will be getting more pictures soon!
